link.title: Cuero ISD Performing Arts Center - News

form.name: aspnetForm

div.label: Translate Page

p.br:
Offsite instruction: Teachers will be putting together packets this week for distribution next week. Packet pick-up details to come.
Online instruction: Calls will be made to all families about internet access this week. Online content and links will be sent out this week through blackboard, website, Facebook, etc.

DATE:
Meals will start Monday the 23rd
TIME:
Breakfast 7:30-9:30
Lunch 11:30-1:30
LOCATION:
Bus loop behind Hunt Elementary off 2nd street.
WHO:
Any child between the age of 0-18 yrs. regardless if they are a Cuero ISD student can receive a meal. Must be present
DELIVERY:
Not available yet, working on it. If you NEED delivery contact Sandra Hernandez, Food Service Director: shernandez@cueroisd.org

If your child left their band instrument, they need their medications, etc.
Band will be contacting parents through remind.
Medication contact school nurse.
Nurses office hours are 9 am - 12 pm next week.

br.br:
Contact your child's campus between 9 am-12 pm next week.
District-wide questions email me: mdyer@cueroisd.org

span.p: All buildings will be locked and there will be no public access without prior authorization.

p.br: I have a running list of questions that we currently do not have answers for, I will periodically put out FAQs on all mentioned media outlets. Please email or call with questions, but be patient. We are inundated with daily phone calls, texts, emails, but your questions are important to us, leave a message and we will get back with you. Many of our staff will be working remotely, so at times communication will be slow.

br.br:
Food Service
shernandez@cueroisd.org
Campus
361-275-1900 and campus extension
General/ Global/ Media
mdyer@cueroisd.org

p.strong:
DO THE FIVE
Help stop Coronavirus
1 HANDS Wash them often
2 ELBOW Cough into it
3 FACE Don't touch it
4 FEET Stay more than 3ft apart
5 FEEL sick? Stay home

span.p: God Bless, Be Careful, and Stay Safe!

For The Children,
Micah A. Dyer
Superintendent
Cuero ISD
